Description: Ivory head-rest; open-work shaft in the form of two tjet-symbols ('Isis knots').
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Deir el-Bersha, Said to come from the tomb of Gua (Guide to 1st Egn Rm, 43)
Exhibition history: 2015-2016 5th Oct - 24th Jan. New York. Metropolitan Museum of Art. Middle Kingdom.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
